title: The Key to Cheap Electric Cars? Ditch the Steering Wheel
text:
The Key to Cheap Electric Cars? Ditch the Steering Wheel 
Published By: Wired.com - Today 
Don't have an extra $130K for the newest Tesla? This guy thinks he's engineered the bare minimum it will take to get the masses to go electr...
